title: Kim Kardashian rubs shoulders with another President as she hangs with world leaders

Kim Kardashian sat down for dinner with Armenian President Armen Sarkissian on Tuesday night alongside her sister Kourtney.

This is not the first time the reality TV star has rubbed shoulders with a head of state as she has previously met with President Donald Trump in the famous Oval office in Washington USA.

Appearing comfortable as she strolled through Sarkissian's Presidential palace in Yerevan, Armenia, with the leader and her sibling, Kim enjoyed an intimate dinner with Sarkissian and a select few guests - including his wife Nouneh Sarkissian.

She covered her famous curves in a navy velvet blazer and matching trousers for the evening and Kourtney opted for a similar business-style ensemble.

The President's office took to Instagram after the dinner on to report on the visit.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The post read: 'Kim and Kourtney said they’ve received very positive energy from their visit to Armenia,' alongside photos of the occasion.

Emmy nominated film producer, MD Eric Esrailian was also present on the day.

Armen Sarkissian assumed his Presidency in 9 April 2018 and served as Prime Minister of the country from November 4, 1996 to March 20, 1997.

It comes after Kim met Trump at the end of May.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Kim, who was dressed in an understated black suit for the day, met the US President at the White House to discuss prison reform..

Following their discussion, Trump took to Twitter to share a picture with his 52million followers of them posing behind his desk in the Oval Office.

"Great meeting with @ KimKardashian today, talked about prison reform and sentencing," he wrote.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

Kim, who was campaigning at the time for clemency for Alice Marie Johnson - which later was granted, tweeted after the meeting: "I would like to thank President Trump for his time this afternoon.

"It is our hope that the President will grant clemency to Ms. Alice Marie Johnson who is serving a life sentence for a first-time, non-violent drug offence.

"We are optimistic about Ms. Johnson’s future and hopeful that she —and so many like her— will get a second chance at life."
description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashian has ditched her celebrity pals for world leaders in recent months
